price: Kuma ta ce wa 'yar'uwarsa,* "Ki bĩ shi." Sabõda haka sai ta lẽƙe shi daga gẽfe, alhãli sũ ba Su sani ba.
arabic: وَقَالَتۡ لِأُخۡتِهِۦ قُصِّيهِۖ فَبَصُرَتۡ بِهِۦ عَن جُنُبٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
footnotes: * Sũnan 'yar'uwar Mũsã Maryamu ko Kalsuma ko Kalsumu. Sũnan uwarsu Yũhãniz ɗiyar Hãmid ɗan Lãwaya ɗan Yãƙũbu.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
